name: Flip Flop (FeatureKreep)
description:
For all his genius, Dr. Flips can't stay out of trouble. The experiments with the mirror dimension ended up with the mirror gate exploding into pieces. Now he must collect all the shards before the barrier between our worlds is forever broken...

Controls

Arrow keys — move

Z — jump

X — activate the mirror dimension

F — toggle fullscreen

Credits

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep

Music: Meat Automaton

Made for Gamedev.js Jam 2021
